name: Welcome: World Data Summit - Amsterdam - May 2022
response:
Dear {{ first_name }},

On behalf of GIA Global Group, I am pleased to welcome you to the World Data Summit, which will take place in Amsterdam, the Netherlands on May 18th - 20th. Stay up to date with the latest agenda by checking this link.


We are currently finalizing the hotel. I will keep you posted once we confirm a discounted rate on accommodation.


Health and safety are a priority at World Data Summit. Today we are announcing that official vaccine certificates or a negative Covid-19 test result will be required to attend the event. Where official certificates cannot be provided, we will require a negative rapid test, which will remain valid for 24 hours. If you require a test on any day of the conference, please let us know in advance.


We will remain supportive of any attendee who wears a mask. We will ensure all appropriate measures, as set by the Dutch health authorities in May, are adhered to. If any rules regarding vaccines and mask-wearing change closer to May, we will alert all attendees in a timely fashion.


In the meantime, do not hesitate to contact me with more questions. We look forward to meeting you in Amsterdam!
subject: Welcome: World Data Summit - Amsterdam - May 2022

name: Startup - World Data Summit 2022 - Amsterdam
response:
Hi {{ first_name }},


Thank you very much for your interest in the World Data Summit!


My name is Anna and I am the Project Director of this meeting, which we schedule for May 2022.


Please click the links below to get a better understanding of the Summit and partnership packages:

  1. World Data Summit - Amsterdam - May 18-20, 2022
  2. Event program
  3. Sponsorship offer

   * for our live event partners we are happy to modify any package to meet your needs.


As for a startup, we are happy to offer you a 50% discount on any package of your interest.


Additionally, please find enclosed a list of our past attendees (both live and virtual meetings) to get a better understanding of the event. Our event is built for good networking, check out the photos from World Data Summit 2019 here and the video here.


Do not hesitate to contact me for more details. Feel free to schedule a call with me here. I look forward to hearing from you!
subject: Startup - World Data Summit 2022 - Amsterdam

name: Discount: World Data Summit 2022
response:
Greetings {{ first_name }},


Thank you very much for your interest in the  World Data Summit!


My name is Anna and I am the Project Director of this meeting, which will take place on May 18-20, 2022. Please click the links below to get more information about the agenda, venue and registration terms:

  1. Event program
  2. Location: Postillion Hotel & Convention Centre Amsterdam
  3. Online registration page


Share your contact details with our partners for one opt-out email and get an additional 15% discount on any ticket purchase. To apply this discount, use a promo code WDS22-PARTNER-15 on our online registration page.


﻿Get a better understanding of the event by checking the list of our past attendees, both live and virtual meetings, enclosed. Our event is all about knowledge exchange and quality networking. You can see the photos from World Data Summit 2019 here and the video here.

Do not hesitate to contact me for more details. Feel free to schedule a call with me here.


I look forward to hearing from you!

Kind regards,
subject: Discount: World Data Summit 2022
